content:
Yes, all of the surf schools I mentioned offer packages or deals for multiple lessons! Here are some options:

1. Let's Go Surfing: Let's Go Surfing offers packages that include multiple lessons at Bondi Beach, as well as equipment hire and transport. For example, their "Surf Saver Pack" includes five two-hour lessons, equipment hire for a week, and transport to and from the beach for $395.

2. Manly Surf School: Manly Surf School offers a five-lesson package for $295, which includes all equipment and transport.

3. Coogee Surf School: Coogee Surf School offers a five-lesson package for $319, which includes all equipment.

All of these packages offer great value for money and are a great way to improve your surfing skills while you're in Sydney. Just be sure to book in advance to secure your spot and get the most out of your time in Sydney!
